game.name: SOK
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SOK is a sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SOK is a sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off.
